changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base_table.id, auth.name AS authority, entity.name AS entity, entity.domain AS domain, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM agency_existential_grouping base_table JOIN existential entity ON base_table.entity = entity.id JOIN existential auth ON base_table.authority = auth.id JOIN existential up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
